channel.title: Allowing MoparScape status checker to connect to server
channel.description:
Hi,
okay. My server is on. I can connect to it with the host computer's IP(not over lan), however moparscape status checker says it's offline.
How can I allow the checker to connect to my server to return it as online?
edit: removed my cname hostname and just used direct ip and it worked.

item.title: Allowing MoparScape status checker to connect to server
